verses.name: Job 12:6
verses.text: The tabernacles of robbers prosper, and they that provoke God are secure; into whose hand God bringeth abundantly.

verses.name: Job 12:7
verses.text: But ask now the beasts, and they shall teach thee; and the fowls of the air, and they shall tell thee:

verses.name: Job 12:8
verses.text: Or speak to the earth, and it shall teach thee: and the fishes of the sea shall declare unto thee.

verses.name: Job 12:9
verses.text: Who knoweth not in all these that the hand of the Lord hath wrought this?

verses.name: Job 12:10
verses.text: In whose hand is the soul of every living thing, and the breath of all mankind.
